#summary Spock versions and their compatible Groovy/JUnit/Grails/etc. versions.

Spock requires Java SE 5.0 or higher. Make sure to pick a Spock version that matches the Groovy version you'd like to use.

== Release Versions ==

Releases are available from http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/spockframework and http://m2repo.spockframework.org/releases.

|| Spock version || Groovy version || JUnit version || Grails version || Spring version ||
|| 0.5-groovy-1.6 || 1.6.1-1.6.x  || 4.7-4.x || 1.2.0-1.2.x || 2.5.0-3.x ||
|| 0.5-groovy-1.7 || 1.7.0-1.7.x  || 4.7-4.x || 1.3.0-1.3.x || 2.5.0-3.x ||

Note: Grails version applies to Grails plugin. Spring version applies to Spring extension.

== Snapshot Versions ==

Snapshots are available from http://m2repo.spockframework.org/snapshots.

|| Spock version || Groovy version || JUnit version || Grails version || Spring version ||
|| 0.6-groovy-1.7-SNAPSHOT || 1.7.0-1.7.x  || 4.7-4.x || 1.3.0-1.3.x || 2.5.0-3.x ||
|| 0.6-groovy-1.8-SNAPSHOT || 1.8 snapshots || 4.7-4.x || - || 2.5.0-3.x ||

Note: Grails version applies to Grails plugin. Spring version applies to Spring extension.
